mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_id, prdt_id, category, member_email, review_content, review_title) VALUES (review_seq.nextval, #{prdtId}, #{category}, #{memberEmail}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewTitle})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_title = #{reviewTitle}, review_content = #{reviewContent}, review_date = sysdate WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
